channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Applications for academic year 2024/2025
item.description: Applications to open-admission Master‚Äôs degree programmes for the academic year 2024/2025 are open from 22 January 2024.%0ANon-EU students VISA applicants can generally apply until 31 March 2024.%0AFor information, please visit the webpage Open admission master programmes.%0A %0A

item.title: Call for CELI exams - A2, B1 and B2 levels on 13-14 March 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 13-14 March 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: seats for the CELI 3 B2 exams are sold out.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Summer School in Sustainable Entrepreneurship, Innovation and Entrepreneurial Finance
item.description: Applications for the Summer School "Sustainable Entrepreneurship, Innovation and Entrepreneurial Finance" are now open. Doctoral students are welcome to apply until 31 January 2024. %0A

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 8 March 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 8 March 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 22 + 23 February 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the computer-based Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 22 + 23 February 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: differently from what is written in the call, results for this session will be available 2-3 weeks from the end of the key assessment date.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details
